data.fullContent: Only female mosquitoes feed on blood; male mosquitoes feed on plant nectar and do not transmit the disease. The females of the Anopheles genus of mosquito prefer to feed at night. They usually start searching for a meal at dusk and will continue throughout the night until taking a meal. Malaria parasites can also be transmitted by blood transfusions, although this is rare.
data.answer: 只有雌蚊以血为食;雄性蚊子以植物花蜜为食，并不传播这种疾病。按蚊属的雌蚊喜欢在夜间进食。它们通常在黄昏时开始寻找食物，并会持续整个晚上直到吃到一顿饭。疟疾寄生虫也可以通过输血传播，尽管这很罕见。
